entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 20.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 07:00 AM EDT Saturday 28 May 2016
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 20.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 78 %
Humidex: 25
Dewpoint: 16.3°C
Wind: SE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 29 except 21 near Lake Huron and Georgian Bay. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this morning. High 29 except 21 near Lake Huron and Georgian Bay. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 28 May 2016
